name: eco_skincare_launch_campaign
description: Build comprehensive campaign for eco-friendly skincare launch
user_message: Build a full campaign to launch our new eco-friendly skincare product targeting environmentally conscious millennials (25-40), primarily female. Budget is $50k, 3 months timeline. Use Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and influencer partnerships.

name: b2b_saas_lead_generation
description: Build B2B SaaS lead generation campaign
user_message: Create a campaign to increase B2B SaaS product sign-ups targeting small business owners and marketing managers. Budget $30k, 2 months. Use LinkedIn, email, webinars, and content marketing.

name: eco_friendly_skincare_launch
description: Tests the agent's ability to create a marketing plan for an eco-friendly skincare product launch targeting millennials.
user_message: I want to launch a new eco-friendly skincare product targeting environmentally conscious millennials (25-40), primarily female. My budget is $50,000 and the timeline is 3 months. I want to use Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and Influencer partnerships.

name: luxury_watch_brand_awareness
description: Tests the agent's ability to create a marketing plan for a luxury watch brand targeting high-net-worth individuals.
user_message: I want to increase brand awareness for a luxury watch brand targeting high-net-worth individuals (45-65), both male and female. My budget is $100,000 and the timeline is 6 months. I'm thinking of using print ads in exclusive magazines, sponsorships of high-profile events, and targeted online advertising.

name: local_restaurant_promotion
description: Tests the agent's ability to create a marketing plan for a local restaurant targeting nearby residents.
user_message: I need a marketing campaign to promote my local restaurant to nearby residents. My budget is $5,000 and the timeline is 1 month. I want to use social media, local newspaper ads, and flyers.

name: mobile_game_user_acquisition
description: Tests the agent's ability to create a marketing plan for a mobile game targeting casual gamers.
user_message: I want to acquire more users for my mobile game. My target audience is casual gamers (18-35). My budget is $20,000 and the timeline is 2 months. I'm thinking of using in-app advertising, social media ads, and influencer marketing.

name: political_campaign_get_out_the_vote
description: Tests the agent's ability to create a get-out-the-vote campaign for a political candidate.
user_message: I need a get-out-the-vote campaign for a political candidate targeting registered voters (18-45). My budget is $10,000 and the timeline is 1 month. I want to use social media, email marketing, and phone banking.

name: nonprofit_fundraising_campaign
description: Tests the agent's ability to create a fundraising campaign for a nonprofit organization.
user_message: I need a fundraising campaign for a nonprofit organization. My target audience is previous donors and potential new donors. My budget is $15,000 and the timeline is 3 months. I want to use email marketing, social media, and direct mail.

name: book_launch_campaign
description: Tests the agent's ability to create a marketing plan for a book launch.
user_message: I need a marketing plan to launch my new book. My target audience is readers interested in historical fiction. My budget is $8,000 and the timeline is 2 months. I want to use social media, book reviews, and author interviews.

name: real_estate_lead_generation
description: Tests the agent's ability to create a lead generation campaign for a real estate agent.
user_message: I need a lead generation campaign for my real estate business. My target audience is first-time homebuyers and experienced investors. My budget is $12,000 and the timeline is 3 months. I want to use online advertising, open houses, and email marketing.

name: new_podcast_launch
description: Tests the agent's ability to create a marketing plan for launching a new podcast.
user_message: I want to launch a new podcast and need a marketing plan. The podcast is about true crime. My target audience is true crime enthusiasts (25-55). My budget is $3,000 and the timeline is 1 month. I want to use social media, podcast directories, and cross-promotion with other podcasts.
